title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 2M.04 - General Design Requirements for Recreational and Cultural Interest Area Symbol Guide Signs
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 2M.04 - General Design Requirements for Recreational and Cultural Interest Area Symbol Guide Signs

State Regulations
INSERT the following paragraphs: Standard: 01A Recreational and cultural interest area symbol signs
listed in Table 2M-1 that are used on highways outside of recreational and
cultural interest areas shall have white symbols and borders and brown
backgrounds, except the Post Office (RS-026) symbol sign shall have a white
symbol and border on a green background, and the Restrooms (RS-022) symbol sign
shall have a white symbol and border on a blue background. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
2M.04

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
